name: King and Queen vs. King
description: A fundamental checkmate. Use the queen to box in the enemy king and the king to deliver the final mate.

name: King and Rook vs. King
description: White to move and deliver checkmate using the rook and king. Use the rook to restrict the black king and the white king to help deliver mate.

name: Two Rooks vs. King (Lawnmower)
description: White has two rooks and must deliver checkmate. Use the rooks together to restrict the black king's movement and finish with a coordinated mate.

name: Back-Rank Mate Practice
description: Practice delivering a back-rank mate. White to move and checkmate the black king on the back rank.

name: Anastasia's Mate Practice
description: Practice Anastasia's mate pattern. White to move and deliver checkmate using the knight and rook.

name: Smothered Mate Practice
description: Practice the smothered mate pattern. Black to move and deliver checkmate using the knight.

name: Mate in 1 (Queen - King)
description: White to move and deliver checkmate in one move using the queen. The black king is on the edge and cannot escape.

name: Mate in 1 (Rook - King)
description: White to move and deliver checkmate in one move using the rook. The black king is on the edge and cannot escape.

name: Mate in 2 (Two Rooks)
description: White has two rooks and must deliver checkmate in two moves. Use the rooks together to restrict the black king's movement and finish with a coordinated mate.
